name: PrismaBio
description:
PrismaBio is a video game project, where the theory of evolution will be visualized in a LowPoly style (or few polygons), of an educational and entertaining nature.

There will be several levels (Also called "Prios" within the game) in which the theory of evolution will be demonstrated graphically, or as it is believed today how species came to be as they are. Each level will be of a different kind starting with humans, although before starting with them a short illustrative 2D video will be shown where the creation of the planet and the first primitive forms of life will be seen.
